short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save references and PDFs to Scholaread from your web browser, and read on MOBILE.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save references and PDFs to Scholaread from your web browser, and read on MOBILE, PC or IPAD.

The extension automatically detects websites as you browse, enabling you to effortlessly save papers directly to Scholaread.

Scholaread transforms intricate PDF research papers, including ones with diagrams, formulas and tables, into a seamless, eye-friendly reading experience on your mobile, tablet and PC. Experience for smooth zooming, clickable citations, resizable text.

With the browser extension, you can save papers from supported databases like arXiv, IEEE, Elsevier, Springer, ACM, and MDPI. Save to Scholaread will automatically detect supported websites as you browse and allows you to save papers to Scholaread. With just a single click on the button, the paper will be saved to your Scholaread reading list. You can access your saved papers later from your phone, tablet or laptop.

In addition to saving papers, you can also import papers from your device to Scholaread. This makes it easy to organize and access all your research in one place.

If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us at support@scholaread.com. Start using the Scholaread browser extension now and enhance your research paper-reading experience!
